home.title: Les √âtoiles du Rocher
home.subtitle: Your haven of peace on the French Riviera

content.quote: The beauty of a place is revealed in the caress of light, the silence that inhabits it, and the emotion it evokes.
content.description1: Imagine a place where luxury meets authenticity, where every detail has been designed for your well-being. Our estate, nestled just 5 minutes from Monaco, offers the perfect balance between absolute tranquility and privileged access to the most beautiful beaches, prestigious boutiques, and events on the French Riviera.
content.description2: Immerse yourself in a 350 m¬≤ space spread over two floors, where five private suites welcome you with exceptional bedding. A discreet outbuilding, nestled in Mediterranean vegetation, is available to host your guests in an idyllic setting.
content.description3: Let yourself be seduced by our infinity pool that blends into the marine horizon, and discover our rooftop offering a breathtaking panorama of Monaco and the Mediterranean.
content.description4: Between intimacy, elegance, and art of living, our estate is the perfect setting for an unforgettable getaway on the Riviera.

villa.title: The Villa Les √âtoiles du Rocher
villa.description: A gem facing the sea, where every detail invites contemplation. Upon waking, the murmur of waves and the azure view will compose your first memory of the day. The refined volumes, open to the outside, offer a subtle sensory experience, combining refinement and authentic Riviera charm.

features.subtitle: Recently completed at the beginning of the year, this luxury villa, never before rented, is ready to offer you unforgettable moments, with family or friends.

discover.title: Discover
discover.subtitle: The Wonders of the French Riviera

hero.title: The Wonders of the French Riviera
hero.description: Discover the most beautiful experiences the region has to offer: hidden beaches, hilltop villages, and sea excursions

hero.subtitle: Suspended between sky and sea, the Villa Les √âtoiles du Rocher invites you to savor the sweetness of the French Riviera

events.title: Places & Events to Discover
events.description: Discover our selection of must-visit places and events to explore during your stay in our exceptional villa.

fortAntoine.title: Night walk at Fort Antoine
fortAntoine.description: Fort Antoine hosts artistic performances under the stars. Enjoy a show in a unique ambiance.

monacoGP.title: Monaco Grand Prix
monacoGP.description: Experience the legendary race from our villa or with our VIP access to the best stands on the circuit.

casino.title: Monte-Carlo Casino
casino.description: Try your luck in the legendary casino where James Bond is a regular. Belle √âpoque architecture and hushed ambiance.

oceanographic.title: Oceanographic Museum
oceanographic.description: Over 6,000 marine species, giant aquariums, and interactive exhibitions in a majestic building overlooking the sea.

rally.title: Monte-Carlo Historic Rally
rally.description: Admire vintage cars traveling the winding roads of the hinterland during this prestigious competition.

forumGrimaldi.title: Grimaldi Forum
forumGrimaldi.description: Convention center hosting the International Television Festival and other exclusive events of the Principality.

topMarques.title: Top Marques Monaco
topMarques.description: Luxury fair where you can admire and even try the world's most exclusive hypercars, watches, and yachts.

jumping.title: Monte-Carlo International Jumping
jumping.description: Prestigious equestrian competition on Port Hercule attracting the world's best riders in an exceptional setting.

yachtShow.title: Monaco Yacht Show
yachtShow.description: The unmissable meeting point for luxury yachting, showcasing the most beautiful exceptional ships and sailboats.

ePrix.title: Monaco E-Prix
ePrix.description: Electrifying Formula E race on the legendary Monaco circuit, combining innovation and motorsport tradition.

concerts.title: Concerts at the Prince's Palace
concerts.description: Exceptional musical evenings in the honor courtyard of the Palace under the Monegasque stars.

monteCarloMasters.title: Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters
monteCarloMasters.description: Prestigious clay court tennis tournament at the Monte-Carlo Country Club, with breathtaking view of the Mediterranean.

nautical.title: Nautical & sports activities
nautical.description: Tailor-made experiences organized by our concierge: golf, private sailboat, diving, or paddle at sunrise.

exoticGarden.title: Exotic Garden of Monaco
exoticGarden.description: Spectacular collection of succulent plants with panoramic view of the Principality and prehistoric caves to explore.

rock.title: The Rock & the Prince's Palace
rock.description: Historical promontory housing the Prince's Palace. Don't miss the changing of the guard of the Prince's Carabinieri.
rock.bestTime: Changing of the guard at 11:55 AM

valley.title: Vall√©e des Merveilles
valley.description: Fascinating archaeological site with 40,000+ rock engravings dating from the Bronze Age, nestled in a grandiose alpine landscape.

secretCove.title: Monaco's secret cove
secretCove.description: Confidential beach with turquoise waters accessible by a discreet path or by sea, away from the hustle and bustle.

rivieraJewels.title: The Jewels of the Riviera
rivieraJewels.description: Discover Villefranche Bay, Beaulieu-sur-Mer, and the gardens of Cap Martin during a panoramic excursion.

roquebrune.title: Roquebrune-Cap-Martin
roquebrune.description: Authentic medieval village with 10th-century castle and thousand-year-old olive tree, the oldest specimen in Europe.

eze.title: √àze, the eagle's nest
eze.description: Perched village offering a spectacular view, with cobbled streets, artisan shops, and the famous Exotic Garden.

saintPaul.title: Saint-Paul de Vence
saintPaul.description: Open-air museum housing prestigious galleries and the Maeght Foundation. Don't miss La Colombe d'Or and its artworks.

mougins.title: Mougins
mougins.description: Picturesque village that became the Mecca of French gastronomy, with starred restaurants and artists' workshops.

saintTropez.title: Saint-Tropez
saintTropez.description: From your villa, reach this mythical village by helicopter or yacht. Stroll along the port and enjoy Pampelonne beaches.

helicopter.title: Helicopter transfers
helicopter.description: Direct connection with Nice airport in 7 minutes or panoramic excursions to discover the French Riviera from the sky.

nautical.title: Nautical experiences
nautical.description: Private sunset cruise, excursion to the L√©rins Islands, or VIP transfer to exclusive coastal destinations.

customsPath.title: Customs Officers' Path
customsPath.description: Preserved coastal walk offering spectacular views of the sea and secret coves of the French Riviera.

ezeVillage.title: √àze Village
ezeVillage.description: Perched at 429m altitude, this medieval village offers a 360¬∞ view of the French Riviera and houses the famous Exotic Garden.

littleAfrica.title: Beaulieu's Little Africa
littleAfrica.description: Secret botanical garden housing rare exotic species and an intimate beach away from the crowds.

corbusier.title: Le Corbusier Path
corbusier.description: Architectural route along the sea revealing iconic villas, including the famous Villa E-1027 by Eileen Gray.

garnier.title: Monte-Carlo's Op√©ra Garnier
garnier.description: Architectural masterpiece usually closed to the public, but accessible during exclusive guided tours we can organize.

blueGulf.title: Blue Gulf
blueGulf.description: Secret cove accessible only by a discreet path or by sea, offering crystal-clear waters and rare tranquility.

cta.title: Your unique experience on the French Riviera

terms.title: General terms
terms.content:
General Terms ‚Äì Villa Les √âtoiles du Rocher
The rental of the villa Les √âtoiles du Rocher, property of the company SAS ALPHA GROUP, is subject to these general terms, which the tenant fully and unreservedly accepts upon signing the rental contract.

1. Occupancy capacity
The villa is designed for a maximum of 10 people (including children). It is strictly forbidden to exceed this capacity, under penalty of immediate termination of the stay, without refund.

2. Parties, nuisances, and tranquility
It is strictly forbidden to organize parties, evenings, or events at the villa.
No noise nuisance is tolerated between 7:00 AM and 10:00 PM to respect the neighborhood's tranquility.
Any breach of this rule may result in the intervention of law enforcement and immediate eviction of the tenant without refund.

3. Animals
Animals are not allowed on the property, without exception, unless prior written authorization from SAS ALPHA GROUP. Any breach will result in immediate termination of the contract, solely at the tenant's fault.

4. Use of premises
The tenant agrees to use the villa peacefully, exclusively for vacation purposes. They agree to respect the house rules, the premises, the equipment, and the neighborhood.

5. Access and security
The keys, badges, and access means provided are strictly personal and must be returned upon departure. Any loss will result in billing for replacement. The tenant is required to close doors, gates, and alarms when leaving the villa.

6. Cleanliness and inventory
The villa is handed over clean and in perfect condition. The tenant must return it in a similar state. Additional cleaning fees may be applied in case of non-compliance.

7. Image rights and intellectual property
All photos, videos, plans, and visuals representing the villa Les √âtoiles du Rocher are the exclusive property of SAS ALPHA GROUP.
They are not free of rights, nor reusable, nor exploitable without prior written authorization. Any infringement will result in civil and/or criminal proceedings.

8. Surveillance and security of premises
For security reasons, certain exterior accesses may be under video surveillance, in accordance with current legislation. No cameras are installed in private or interior spaces.

9. Liability and insurance
The tenant is responsible for damages, losses, or deterioration caused to the villa or its equipment.
It is strongly recommended to take out vacation insurance covering their rental civil liability.

10. Acceptance
The signing of the rental contract constitutes full acceptance of these general terms, the general sales conditions, as well as the house rules.

sales.title: General Sales Conditions
sales.content:
General Sales Conditions ‚Äì Les √âtoiles du Rocher
1. Reservation
The reservation of the villa Les √âtoiles du Rocher, property of the company SAS ALPHA GROUP, is considered firm and definitive only after:
receipt of a 50% deposit of the total stay amount,
and the signing of a rental contract, established for each reservation.
The rental contract must necessarily be drafted and signed by both parties before any entry into the premises.
The balance of the stay must be paid in full no later than 60 days before the arrival date. In case of non-payment by this deadline, the reservation may be canceled by right without refund of the deposit.

2. Security deposit
A security deposit of ‚Ç¨5,000 is required upon arrival. It will be refunded within a maximum of 15 days after departure, less any damages, breaches of regulations, or additional costs.

3. Cancellation
Any cancellation by the client results in the following conditions:
More than 90 days before arrival: refund of 70% of the deposit paid,
Between 90 and 60 days: refund of 50% of the deposit,
Between 60 and 30 days: no refund of the deposit,
Less than 30 days before arrival: no refund, the total amount of the stay remains due.
There is no right of withdrawal.

4. Arrival and departure
Arrival: from 4:00 PM,
Departure: no later than 10:00 AM.
Any unauthorized overtime will result in additional billing.

5. Capacity and use
Maximum number of people allowed: 10 people, including children.
It is strictly forbidden to organize parties, events, or receptions in the villa.
No noise nuisance is tolerated between 7:00 AM and 10:00 PM.
Animals are not accepted, except with prior written agreement.
Any breach of these rules may result in immediate termination of the contract solely at the client's fault, with no possible refund.

6. House rules
The client agrees to respect the house rules provided upon arrival. This document is an integral part of the contract. Any serious breach (damages, disrespect to neighbors, non-compliance with prohibitions) will result in the loss of the security deposit and may lead to legal action.

7. Additional services
Additional services (private chef, butler, concierge, etc.) must be reserved at least 15 days before arrival. Any modification or cancellation of these services must be made at least 7 days in advance; otherwise, the amount remains due.

8. Image rights and intellectual property
All photographs, videos, and visuals representing the villa Les √âtoiles du Rocher are the exclusive property of SAS ALPHA GROUP.
Any reproduction, publication, or use without prior written authorization is strictly prohibited.

9. Liability
The client is responsible for damages caused by themselves or their companions. They are required to take out vacation insurance. A certificate may be required upon arrival.

10. Disputes
In case of dispute, the parties will seek an amicable solution. Failing that, the competent courts are those of the location of the villa.
